definition: (coll.) to have diarrhea/to shrink back/to cower
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: A child with his mother is directly related to diet.
sentences.chinese: 孩子拉稀与母亲的饮食有直接关系。

sentences.english: Silhouettes flashed on Lash's display, confirming Yang's analysis.
sentences.chinese: 雷达侧影在拉稀的显示屏上闪烁，证实了杨的分析。

sentences.english: We are in the midst of a series of messages on the life of Abraham.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在讲一系列跟亚伯拉稀有关的信息。

sentences.english: Made him shit flowers every time he had a cruel thought.
sentences.chinese: 这个咒语让他每次有了一个残酷的想法就会拉稀。

sentences.english: "We're following Admiral Patterson's orders to the letter, " Lash said.
sentences.chinese: “我们严格遵照皮特逊将军的命令，”拉稀说道。

sentences.english: Lash danced a fine line. He wanted speed and invisibility.
sentences.chinese: 拉稀选择了一个圆舞曲似的航线，他想要速度和隐蔽。

sentences.english: Someone said, you let the children cold drink, children not sparse?
sentences.chinese: 有人说，你让小孩子喝凉开水，小孩子岂不拉稀？

sentences.english: You try to fart and you get a little poop in your pants?
sentences.chinese: 你想放屁你却不小心在裤子上拉稀了？

sentences.english: It turns out cauliflower gives their dog explosive diarrhea.
There is a passenger inside nasty, urinate urgently to diarrhea, request the driver to stop.
sentences.chinese: 有一乘客内急，实在憋不住要拉稀，请求司机停车。

sentences.english: There were no symptoms in infected cattle.
sentences.chinese: 犊牛表现明显拉稀症状。

definition: to poo poo (kiddie or feminine term)/also pr. [bian3 bian3]
(of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
